summary: what is your favorite anime person in the show and what is your reason for liking them?
question: what is your favorite anime person in the show and what is your reason for liking them?
answer:
*incoming super generic answer xD but honest response* gotta say (one of them is) Deku because:

1.) He’s so much fun to draw xD his hair is just… his hair and his freckles just… HE’S SO CUTE!! *heart squeeze*

2.) I admire how he can be both a cinnamon roll and a complete badass. Horikoshi having the ability to portray him from being a cute and soft boi to a macho strong hero boi and back again is incredible xD it makes me go from awww to ayyyy!!!

3.) His determination and drive to achieve his dreams is 💯💯. Always a good trait :3 I mean.. he’s just such a happy boi, my heart goes out to him ❣❣.

4.) Guilty fujoshi 👀👀 I’ve managed to fall into this trap xD no regrets tho. There are some awesome doujinshis out there that have my soul xD

5.) He broke Todoroki and I am grateful for this xD

There are many other reasons but I hope this is satisfying enough for an answer lmao XD here’s a villain deku 🤤🤪😍💖 (sorry it’s a lil dim ;^;)

summary:
*it's 3 am*
Deku : *wakes up by the sound of music* What..? Why is Aoyama playing music at this time?...
Deku : *goes to his...
body:
*it’s 3 am*

Deku : *wakes up by the sound of music* What..? Why is Aoyama playing music at this time?…

Deku : *goes to his door and knocks*

Aoyama : *music stops* …. *opens the door hesitently*

Deku :

Aoyama :

Deku :

Aoyama :

(reminder that their dorms are right next to each other)

blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary:
Bakugou Katsuki : The game's up, ***hole! Where are the ****ing hostages?
Shigaraki Tomura : We're going to play a little game,...
body:
Bakugou Katsuki : The game's up, ***hole! Where are the ****ing hostages?
Shigaraki Tomura : We're going to play a little game, Kacchan... I have kidnapped Monoma and Shindo, and each of them is about to die a horrible death.
Bakugou Katsuki : Oh, and let me guess, ****head... I can only save one of them?
Shigaraki Tomura : ...I was about to say "you can also only let one of them die".
Bakugou Katsuki : [flattered] Wow, you DO know me.

dialogue.name: Bakugou Katsuki
dialogue.label: Bakugou Katsuki :
dialogue.phrase: The game's up, ***hole! Where are the ****ing hostages?

dialogue.name: Shigaraki Tomura
dialogue.label: Shigaraki Tomura :
dialogue.phrase: We're going to play a little game, Kacchan... I have kidnapped Monoma and Shindo, and each of them is about to die a horrible death.

blog.name: mimitheroyaishipper
blog.title: RoyAi is CANON
blog.description:
I'm just a FMA teenage fangirl. 
OK, I think that's enough of description. I also like Boku no hero academia and I ship TodoMomo almost as much as I ship Royai. THEY HAVE SIMILAR ENERGY. 😸

summary:
And HELLO THERE, MY BEAUTIFUL FOLLOWERS! (that was kinda creepy)
Here I am after who knows how long with an actual art.  And...
body:
And HELLO THERE, MY BEAUTIFUL FOLLOWERS! (that was kinda creepy)

Here I am after who knows how long with an actual art. And again it’s Momo, again. But can you blame me? She’s a goddess.

Well, this pretty much shows her creation quirk covering her body. Don’t ask me how this works, I just think it looks beautiful.

If you wanna repost this art in other social media or here, don’t forget to link my work and give me credit. I did this art after all.

I almost reached 500 followers and I have no idea how, but THANK YOU! I APPRECIATE EVERY SINGLE ONE OF YOU PEOPLE!

blog.name: bright-and-beautiful-tea-child
blog.title: Uraraka Ochako manga panels blog
blog.description:
Hello! this is a fan appreciation blog for our heroaca best girl: the gravity princess!
I'll try to provide the best quality I can, I tag the chapters and costumes to make it easier too. There's "Hero costume", "School uniform", "Casual clothes" and "Special occasion" for things that don't fit into the 3 categories above.
Things that aren't really part of a chapter will be under "bonus" and "sketch".

blog.name: incorrectbnhavillainsworld
blog.title: Not-so-correct- bnha-villain-quotes
blog.description: Please read our rules before submitting.

summary:
mr compress: Is that Shigaraki? Is he alive?
Dabi: Why did you think he was dead?
Spinner: We kind of...left him.
Dabi: Left him...
body:
mr compress: Is that Shigaraki? Is he alive?

Dabi: Why did you think he was dead?

Spinner: We kind of…left him.

Dabi: Left him for dead?

Twice: Sounds bad when you put it that way. Can you put it a way that sounds good?

reblog.comment:
mr compress: Is that Shigaraki? Is he alive?

Dabi: Why did you think he was dead?

Spinner: We kind of…left him.

Dabi: Left him for dead?

Twice: Sounds bad when you put it that way. Can you put it a way that sounds good?

trail.content_raw:
mr compress: Is that Shigaraki? Is he alive?

Dabi: Why did you think he was dead?

Spinner: We kind of…left him.

Dabi: Left him for dead?

Twice: Sounds bad when you put it that way. Can you put it a way that sounds good?
trail.content:
mr compress: Is that Shigaraki? Is he alive?

Dabi: Why did you think he was dead?

Spinner: We kind of…left him.

Dabi: Left him for dead?

Twice: Sounds bad when you put it that way. Can you put it a way that sounds good?
